db:abstract.db:para: The QBoxSet class represents one item in a box-and-whiskers chart.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A box-and-whiskers item is a graphical representation of a range and three median values that is constructed from five different values. There are two ways to specify the values. The first one is by using a constructor or stream operator (<<). The values have to be specified in the following order: lower extreme, lower quartile, median, upper quartile, and upper extreme.
The second way is to create an empty QBoxSet instance and specify the values using the setValue() method.
See the Charts with Widgets Gallery to learn how to create a box-and-whiskers chart.

db:section.db:title: enum QBoxSet::ValuePositions
db:section.db:para: This enum type defines the values of a box-and-whiskers item:

db:td.db:para: The smallest value of the box-and-whiskers item.
The median value of the lower half of the box-and-whiskers item.
The median value of the box-and-whiskers item.
The median value of the upper half of the box-and-whiskers item.
The largest value of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: brush : QBrush
db:section.db:para: This property holds the brush used fill the box of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: pen : QPen
db:section.db:para: This property holds the pen used to draw the lines of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QBoxSet::QBoxSet(const QString label = QString(), QObject *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a box-and-whiskers item with the optional label label and parent parent.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QBoxSet::QBoxSet(const qreal le, const qreal lq, const qreal m, const qreal uq, const qreal ue, const QString label = QString(), QObject *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a box-and-whiskers item with the following ordered values: le specifies the lower extreme, lq the lower quartile, m the median, uq the upper quartile, and ue the upper quartile. Optionally, the label and parent can be specified.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QBoxSet::~QBoxSet()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the a box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::append(const QList<qreal> &values)
db:section.db:para: Appends a list of real values specified by values to the end of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::append(const qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Appends the new value specified by value to the end of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: qreal QBoxSet::at(const int index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the box-and-whiskers item specified by index. The index can be specified by using ValuePositions enumeration values. If the index is out of bounds, 0.0 is returned.

db:section.db:title: QBrush QBoxSet::brush() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the brush used to fill the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::brushChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the brush of the box-and-whiskers item changes.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::clear()
db:section.db:para: Sets all the values of the box-and-whiskers item to 0.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::cleared()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when all the values of the box-and-whiskers item are set to 0.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::clicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user clicks a box-and-whiskers item in the chart.

db:section.db:title: int QBoxSet::count() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of values appended to the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::doubleClicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user double-clicks a box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::hovered(bool status)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when a mouse is hovered over a box-and-whiskers item in a chart. When the mouse moves over the item, status turns true, and when the mouse moves away again, it turns false.

db:section.db:title: QString QBoxSet::label() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the label of the category of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: QPen QBoxSet::pen() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the pen used to draw the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::penChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the pen of the box-and-whiskers item changes.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::pressed()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user clicks a box-and-whiskers item in the chart and holds down the mouse button.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::released()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user releases the mouse press on a box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
db:section.db:para: Sets the brush used to fill the box-and-whiskers item to brush.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::setLabel(const QString label)
db:section.db:para: Sets the label specified by label for the category of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::setPen(const QPen &pen)
db:section.db:para: Sets the pen used to draw the box-and-whiskers item to pen.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::setValue(const int index, const qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the value specified by value in the position specified by index. The index can be specified by using the ValuePositions enumeration values.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::valueChanged(int index)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the value of the box-and-whiskers item specified by index is modified.

db:section.db:title: void QBoxSet::valuesChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when multiple values of the box-and-whiskers item change.

db:section.db:title: QBoxSet &QBoxSet::operator<<(const qreal &value)
db:section.db:para: A convenience operator for appending the real value specified by value to the end of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: qreal QBoxSet::operator[](const int index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the box-and-whiskers item specified by index. The index can be specified by using ValuePositions enumeration values. If the index is out of bounds, 0.0 is returned.
